modName: Tattoos for CBBE v3 Curvy Body
summary: Because I want to give everyone of my custom followers their own special tattoo I have made this mod.
descriptionHtml:
The tattoos are made with Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition CBBE v3 Curvy HQ, so it requires that you have installed CBBE v3 Curvy.
The first tattoo I called Angels in Love and the second Dragon Rose included a Butterfly at the bellybutton.

Requirements:
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE v3 Curvy
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Installation:
Unpack and rename one of the 2 dds files of your choice to femalebody_1.dds and copy that femalebody_1.dds to your data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female folder.

Included:
The psd files of the 3 tattoos called Angels in Love, Butterfly and Dragon Rose are useable with every body mod.
They are for free use to customize your own followers or races.

Credits:
The credits and my special thank goes to Caliente for her
great Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition CBBE
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

and Bethesda for that great game.
author: Startrooper55
